CustomField.formula: IF( AND( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , 'None') , ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , 'Approved') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Term_Exception_Approval_Status__c , 'None') , ISPICKVAL( Term_Exception_Approval_Status__c , 'Approved') ) ) , OR( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Ready for Signatures"))), (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Signature Declined"))) ) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_HelptotheSeller?id="&Id &"&text" & "&name="&Name, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__eSignature","Send For eSignatures"), "_self"), NULL )
CustomField.label: Compile And Send For eSignature
